ModMetaData.name: Searchable Menus
ModMetaData.author: kathanon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a quick search field to any float menu that is at least a minimum size (configurable, default 15).
Safe to add and remove at any time.
Note for mod developers: The menu search field is available for modders through the Float Sub-Menus mod. This mod just adds it to menus that do not already have it.
